references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for diffusion-based generative models, which is heavily leveraged by the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a significant advancement in diffusion models that enables high-resolution image generation, which is the foundation for many of the methods compared in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for using stochastic differential equations (SDEs) to model diffusion processes, which is crucial to the efficiency improvements in the current paper.
This paper proposes a method for image super-resolution using iterative refinement with diffusion models, which is directly compared against in the current paper's results.

references.paper_title: Exploiting diffusion prior for real-world image super-resolution
references.reason: This paper is among the most directly related to the current work, also focusing on leveraging diffusion models for real-world image super-resolution, and its efficiency is directly compared with the current work's results.
